knimeNode.name: Run R Model in Microsoft SQL Server
knimeNode.shortDescription: Run R code with a pre-trained R model on a Microsoft SQL Server in a database.

fullDescription.intro:
This node allows running R code on a Microsoft SQL Server (using a SQL query behind the scenes). Input and output data to the R script are SQL tables. In addition the knime.model and knime.flow.in variables from a R port can be used in the R script.
JDBC Driver
This node requires the Microsoft JDBC driver to be used in the Microsoft SQL Server connector. Please download it from here and add sqljdbc_6.0\enu\jre8\sqljdbc42.jar in the "Preferences -> Databases" panel.
